description: Image manifest for Excellence in Entrepreneurship course

images.prompt: Panoramic mountain landscape at sunset with glowing teal path connecting 7 stations from base to summit

weekBackgrounds.description: Background images for week landing pages and detail views

images.title: Base Camp - Foundation
images.visualElements: Geodesic domes, solar panels, campfire, welcome arch, diverse entrepreneurs

images.title: Observation Outpost - Customer Discovery
images.visualElements: Satellite dishes, binoculars, data monitors, drone, mountain views

images.title: Maker Lab - Product Design
images.visualElements: Glass-walled cliff building, 3D printers, whiteboards, diverse entrepreneurs collaborating

images.title: Alpine Lodge - Sales Strategy
images.visualElements: Warm wooden lodge, string lights, porch conversations, cozy atmosphere

images.title: Observation Tower - Financial Readiness
images.visualElements: Multi-level glass tower, charts, telescope, panoramic views, entrepreneurs analyzing data

images.title: Communications Station - Go-To-Market
images.visualElements: Radio towers, satellite dishes, helipad, command center, entrepreneurs coordinating

images.title: Summit Pavilion - Launch & Graduation
images.visualElements: Glass pyramid, fireworks, celebration, diverse entrepreneurs celebrating

lessonHeaders.description: Wide banner images for individual lesson pages

images.title: Welcome to the Journey
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration showing diverse entrepreneurs at base camp starting their journey, warm sunrise colors, mountain path ahead, excitement and anticipation mood

images.title: The Entrepreneurial Mindset
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration of entrepreneur silhouette looking at mountain, brain visualization with growth mindset concepts, warm teal and gold accents

images.title: Crafting Your Elevator Pitch
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration of entrepreneur presenting to a small group at camp, speech bubbles, confident posture, warm campfire lighting

images.title: Setting Your Goals
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration of mountain climber plotting route on map, target markers on peaks, compass, golden hour lighting

images.title: The Customer Discovery Mindset
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration at observation post, binoculars, radar screens showing customer data, curious explorers, sunset colors

images.title: Building Your Customer Hypothesis
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration of whiteboard with customer persona sketches, sticky notes, entrepreneurs discussing hypotheses

images.title: The Art of Customer Interviews
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration of two people in conversation at observation deck, listening posture, notepad, warm atmosphere

images.title: Capturing and Analyzing Insights
images.prompt: Wide banner illustration of data visualization screens, pattern recognition, insights emerging from data, teal glow accents

artStyle.type: Stylized digital painting with AAA video game concept art aesthetic
artStyle.rendering: NOT photorealistic - warm painterly textures with visible brushstrokes

colorPalette.lighting: Golden hour warm tones (amber, orange, gold)

atmosphere.fog: Atmospheric fog and haze in mountain valleys
atmosphere.lighting: Volumetric god rays, warm rim lighting

visualMetaphor.theme: Mountain expedition - entrepreneurs as explorers climbing toward summit

imageGeneration.stylePrefix: stylized digital painting, AAA video game concept art style, warm painterly textures with visible brushstrokes, golden hour lighting, teal and amber color grading, atmospheric fog and haze, adventure expedition aesthetic, cinematic composition, Unreal Engine 5 stylized render, 8K resolution, highly detailed
imageGeneration.negativePrompt: text, words, letters, numbers, logo, watermark, signature, photorealistic, photograph, photo, realistic skin texture, camera, DSLR, stock photo, blurry, low quality, amateur

diversityRequirement.description: MANDATORY: Apply before ANY image prompt with people
diversityRequirement.rule: All images featuring people must include diverse representation of ethnicities and genders
demographics: Asian (East Asian, South Asian, Southeast Asian)
promptRules: ALWAYS specify explicit ethnicity in prompts (e.g., 'Black woman', 'Hispanic man')
Never use vague terms like 'diverse' alone - be explicit
Gender balance: ~50/50 men and women across course
Rotate demographics across scenes - no clustering
Avoid stereotyping demographics with specific roles
diversityRequirement.promptFormat: Place ethnicity+gender at START of person description: 'a Black woman entrepreneur' not 'an entrepreneur (diverse)'
